page.title: 02A SCHOOL DAY IN IRCHESTER
page.content: By Emma Felstead. Age 10. On Wednesday morning I get up at 7.30am .I have a wash, get dressed and go down for breakfast.I put some milk on to boil for my Weetabix.My friend, Sarah, calls for me and we go up to the shop to collect a paper so that my mum can play newspaper bingo.When we get back I put my packed lunch box in my bag and we walk to school.The bell goes at 8.50am. After assembly we do Maths and Art.Lunch is at 12.15.I have egg sandwiches, a yoghurt, biscuit and a drink.We go to Dance Club at 12.45.During the afternoon we do topic work and games.The bell goes at 3.30 and we walk home.I have mince, potatoes and cabbage for my tea. Afterwards I watch televison and go to bed at 10.00pm.
